profileAlternative.name: Philippe Parant
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Software Developer, Architect and Java/JEE Advisor
profileAlternative.summary: Understand, learn, master and leverage software technologies and best practices to improve business process and maximize business value

aboutAlternative.text: Understand, learn, master and leverage software technologies and best practices to improve business process and maximize business value

positions.title: Enterprise software developer, portfolio owner, Java/JEE advisor
positions.description:
Maintenance of proven (12 years) Java/JEE enterprise web applications framework, support for application owners and developer community
Creation, deployment and continuous improvement of a software factory: JEE6/7 application servers, Continuous Integration (CI), Content Management System (CMS), development environment (customized IDE), Quality Assurance (QA) and testing tooling for Behavioral and Test Driven Developments (BDD, TDD), guidelines, components, support for agile developments
Successful co-development of complex reporting applications with internal core team or in collaboration with subcontractors, agile project leadership
Responsible for 8 line management applications portfolio, regular reviews and evolutions with representative key users
Figures: hundreds of users (clean room, industrial engineering and manufacturing departments), 40+ web applications, 2M+ lines of code
…
see more

positions.title: STMicroelectronics
positions.description:
Preparation of a validation and benchmark demonstrator for single chip products (smartphone market) at application level (Java ME, Android), involving Divisions and external partners; technical advisor
Involvement in product definitions and roadmaps
Participation and follow-up of standardization bodies (OMA, OMTP, JCP)
Coordination of a security working group across the Company
